opportunities.title: Youth Tutoring Program Volunteer
opportunities.description: Help K-12 students with homework and reading skills. Make a direct impact on young lives by providing academic support and mentorship. Training provided. Background check required for working with minors.
opportunities.requirements: Must be 18+, pass background check, commit to at least 2 months

opportunities.title: Food Bank Sorting & Distribution Volunteer
opportunities.description: Sort and package food donations for distribution to families in need. Great for groups, families, and corporate teams. No experience necessary - we provide all training!
opportunities.requirements: Able to stand for 2-3 hours, lift up to 25 lbs

opportunities.title: Senior Companion & Friendly Visitor
opportunities.description: Visit with isolated seniors, provide companionship, play games, help with errands, or simply have a conversation. Make a real difference in combating loneliness among older adults.
opportunities.requirements: Reliable, patient, good listener, pass background check

opportunities.title: Virtual ESL Conversation Partner
opportunities.description: Help adult English language learners practice conversational English via video chat. Flexible schedule - volunteer from anywhere! Make a difference in helping newcomers integrate into their communities.
opportunities.requirements: Native or fluent English speaker, reliable internet connection

opportunities.title: Animal Shelter Dog Walker & Socializer
opportunities.description: Walk and socialize shelter dogs to improve their behavior and increase their chances of adoption. Help reduce stress and provide enrichment for dogs awaiting their forever homes.
opportunities.requirements: Must be 18+, comfortable with dogs of all sizes, pass orientation

opportunities.title: Home Build Volunteer
opportunities.description: Help build affordable homes for families in need. No construction experience necessary - we'll teach you everything! Great way to learn new skills while making a tangible difference in your community.
opportunities.requirements: Must be 16+ (18+ for power tools), wear closed-toe shoes

opportunities.title: Disaster Response Volunteer
opportunities.description: Be trained and ready to respond to local disasters. Help with sheltering, feeding, and providing comfort for affected families. Training provided - be there when your community needs you most.
opportunities.requirements: Must be 18+, complete online and in-person training, flexible availability

opportunities.title: Nonprofit Website & Tech Support
opportunities.description: Use your web development, design, or tech skills to help nonprofits improve their online presence. Remote work, flexible hours. Make a huge impact by helping small organizations reach more people.
opportunities.requirements: Experience in web development, design, or IT support

opportunities.title: Park Cleanup & Conservation Volunteer
opportunities.description: Help maintain local parks through cleanup events, trail maintenance, invasive species removal, and native plant gardening. Connect with nature while improving your community's green spaces.
opportunities.requirements: Able to work outdoors, wear appropriate clothing

opportunities.title: Hospital Patient Greeter & Wayfinder
opportunities.description: Welcome visitors, provide directions, and assist patients with check-in at hospital entrances. Friendly personality essential. Help reduce stress for patients and families navigating the hospital.
opportunities.requirements: Friendly demeanor, reliable, pass health screening and background check

opportunities.title: AmeriCorps VISTA Education Fellow
opportunities.description: Full-time service position helping under-resourced schools and education programs. Living stipend, education award upon completion, and healthcare benefits provided. A transformative year of service.
opportunities.requirements: US citizen or permanent resident, 18+, bachelor's degree preferred

opportunities.title: Crisis Text Line Counselor
opportunities.description: Support people in crisis via text messaging. Extensive training provided (30+ hours). Make a life-saving difference from home. Minimum 4-hour weekly commitment for 1 year.
opportunities.requirements: 18+, complete extensive training, commit to 1 year/4 hrs per week
